t: Anybody heard of B&B lump charcoal? | THE BBQ BRETHREN FORUMS
s: That green bag is by far the best charcoal I’ve burned and what I use exclusively. Hardly any sparks and burns stupid hot with low ash. I love anything B&B and have tried most all of their offerings and never have been dissatisfied. Get their red char logs in the red 30lb bags also if available. Those are my two go to’s almost all the time. ... https://www.bbcharcoal.com/about B&B was my go to after Ozark Oak departed. However I've never been a one brand ...

t: r/BBQ on Reddit: A Charcoal Revelation this weekend. I randomly bought this B&B charcoal at Ace Hardware due to a great price. I bought it to use in my Pit Barrel Cooker. The briquettes are larger than most. But what shocked me, was I was able to get 13 hours of 250°f heat on 8 pounds of charcoal. I was shocked.
s: February 14, 2022 - Discuss any and everything BBQ. Have questions? Ask fellow pitmasters! ... B&B is awesome stuff. The mesquite lump (yellow bag) is my favorite.
